instruction: looking for a thrilling spy movie with lots of action and revenge
output: If you want an action-packed spy flick with a serious revenge twist, you gotta check out Licence to Kill! Timothy Dalton brings some serious edge as Bond goes rogue to take down a drug lord. Perfect mix of thrills and loyalty drama! 🎬🕵️‍♂️🔥

instruction: any good James Bond movies with cool Florida settings and intense drama?
output: Oh, Licence to Kill is your go-to! It’s got all the Florida Keys vibes, drug trafficking drama, and some intense Bond action. Plus, that rogue Bond storyline is super gripping! Perfect for a suspenseful night in! 🌴🎥💥

instruction: need a classic James Bond movie where he fights drug cartels and goes after bad guys personally
output: Licence to Kill totally fits that bill! Bond’s on a personal mission of revenge against a ruthless drug lord, with plenty of high-stakes action and cool secret agent stuff. Definitely a must-watch if you like your Bond serious and intense! 😎🔫🚁
